sentences.en: A conciliation service helps to settle disputes between employers and workers.
sentences.cn: 调解机构协助解决劳资纠纷.

sentences.en: Article 10 An application form for conciliation shall contain the following particular.
sentences.cn: 第10条(调解申请书应记载事项)调解申请书应载明左列事项.
通过调解, 友好合作关系得以确立.

sentences.en: Conciliation and compromise are to get a chance , while flamboyance is out.
sentences.cn: 激进主义开始势微,拆衷和安抚主义开始抬头.

sentences.en: Conciliation can be conducted by a single judge or a collegiate panel.
sentences.cn: 调解可以由审判员一人主持,也可以由合议庭主持.

sentences.en: Conciliation Commission office located at the enterprise trade union committee.
sentences.cn: 调解委员会的办事机构设在企业工会委员会.

sentences.en: General Clark radioed that without Darlan no conciliation was possible.
sentences.cn: 克拉克将军以无线电报称如无达而郎,任何和谈俱不可能.

sentences.en: I brought in conciliation and peace instead of war.
sentences.cn: 我们带来了和解安定而不是战争.

sentences.en: Ideology transcends limits, eschews restraints, and disdains tolerance or conciliation.
sentences.cn: 意识形态越出界限, 避开遏制, 蔑视宽容或和解.

sentences.en: Obviously her attempt at conciliation had failed.
sentences.cn: 显然是要讲和,交涉办不好.

sentences.en: Resolving the dispute will require a mood of conciliation on both sides.
sentences.cn: 解决这一争端需要双方都有和解的意愿。

sentences.en: Sinc e forc e is no remedy; let us try conciliation.
sentences.cn: 武力既不中用, 就想法和解吧.

sentences.en: The experi-ence has left him sceptical about efforts at conciliation.
sentences.cn: 这段经历使他对调停行动持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: There was a brief period of conciliation but the fighting soon resumed.
sentences.cn: 双方之间曾有一段短暂的调停期,但之后很快又打起来了.

sentences.en: UK employment law embodies arbitration and conciliation mechanisms for settling industrial disputes.
sentences.cn: 英国雇佣法包括解决劳资纠纷的仲裁和调解机制。

words.tran_cn: 安抚，安慰；调和；驯服；怀柔；赢得

trans.tran_cn: 调解，安抚，说服，迎合，调和主义，调和主义者
